entity.name: invissue
entity.whereclause: (ISSUETYPE = 'ISSUE' or ISSUETYPE = 'RETURN') and INVISSUE.ITEMNUM is not NULL

entity.name: physicalCount
entity.whereclause: RECONCILED = 1 and DATEDIFF(day, physcntdate, GETDATE()) > inventory_.ccf and inventory_.ccf != 0

attribute.name: availablequantity
attribute.query: (select CAST(SUM(COALESCE(curbal, 0)) AS INT) from invbalances where itemnum = !@itemnum and siteid = !@siteid and location = !@location)

entity.name: inventory
entity.whereclause: inventory.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' and (select CAST(SUM(COALESCE(curbal, 0)) AS INT) from invbalances where invbalances.itemnum = inventory.itemnum and invbalances.siteid = inventory.siteid and invbalances.location = inventory.location) > 0

attribute.name: quantity
attribute.query: (select CAST(SUM(COALESCE(curbal, 0)) AS INT) from invbalances where invbalances.itemnum = !@itemnum and invbalances.siteid = !@siteid and invbalances.location = !@location)
